data.eml:eml: A review of Afrotropical Perasis Hermann, 1905 (Diptera: Asilidae: Laphriinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Londt, Jason G. H. (2007): A review of Afrotropical Perasis Hermann, 1905 (Diptera: Asilidae: Laphriinae). Zootaxa 1521: 9-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177463
